DOC.brief_summary: The clinical protocol clinical test device : 1 . Objective test : To verify function efficiency device . 2 . Test method procedure : Comparison Test . 3 . Device Under Test ( DUT ) : Transtek Body Fat Analyzer , Model : GBF-835-N2 , GBF-835-N2 Plus , LS202-B1 , LS202-B1 Plus , LS206-E1 , LS206-E1 Plus , GBF-1251-B1 , GBF-1251-B1 Plus . 4 . Comparison device : TRANSTEK GBF-1251-B Tanita BC-533 . 5 . Study endpoint : DUT comparison device substantial equivalence . 6 . Statistical methodology use : Description statistical method .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Transtek Body Fat Analyzer ( GBF-835-N2 & Other 7 Models )
DOC.detailed_description: 1 . Test Purpose : The aim clinical test collect BMI , body fat , total body water , muscle mass , bone mass , calorie , visceral fat read value measure DUT reference device . 2 . Target Subject : The subject database shall contain least 30 male 30 female subject 10 year old . 3 . Test procedure : 1 . Record name , age , gender , height subject . 2 . Let subject seat calmly two minute test , dry foot . 3 . Use device measure weight , body fat , total body water , bone mass , muscle mass ; record reading value . 4 . For subject , repeat 3 ) get 3 pair measurement . 5 . Repeat step 1 ) 4 ) every device ( DUT : GBF-835-N2 , GBF-835-N2 Plus , LS202-B1 , LS202-B1 Plus , LS206-E1 , LS206-E1 Plus , GBF-1251-B1 , GBF-1251-B1 Plus ; reference device : GBF-1251-B BC-533 ) . 6 . Repeat step 1 ) 5 ) subject . 4 . Note : 1 . No motion speaking allow measurement . 2 . All DUT use algorithm contact patient body location ( foot ) , operate frequency . 3 . Test environment : Temperature : 22±1℃ ; Relative humidity : 40~70 % .
